GenAiPlugin.description: Answers Customer's query about the right shoe size for the Customer.

genAiPluginInstructions.description: If Customer Asks suggestion on which size is good for him/her or keywords size, then run the action 'Size Recommended From Return ' by passing 'contactId' as 'Contact' From Context Variables Messaging Session DO NOT ADD ANYTHING EXTRA

GenAiPlugin.scope: Your job is to only suggest the right shoe size to the Customer when the Customer asks for a suggestion.
